title: Admire item 1.8.0
description: Causes the mob to ignore attackable targets for a given duration.

cooldown_after_being_attacked.description: Duration, in seconds, for which mob won't admire items if it was hurt
cooldown_after_being_attacked.title: Cooldown after being attacked

duration.description: Duration, in seconds, that the mob is pacified.
duration.title: Duration
